About me

My name is Francis Augusto Medeiros-Logeay. I currently live and work in Oslo, Norway. I have a mixed background: a law degree, a master (LL.M) in IT-Law, and a bachelor degree in informatics.

Work:

  • Java, SQL, Privacy, GDPR.

Fun:

  • Running, Arduino, Python, Reading.
